snippet: Mr. Bailey, a reporter and editor at The Minneapolis Tribune, won renown as a co-author of the novel “Seven Days in May,” about an American coup plot.
abstract: Charles W Bailey, author and former reporter and editor at The Minneapolis Tribune, dies at age 82.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Bailey, a reporter and editor at The Minneapolis Tribune, won renown as a co-author of the novel “Seven Days in May,” about an American coup plot.

headline.seo: Charles W. Bailey, 82, Dies; Wrote ‘Seven Days in May’
headline.main: Charles W. Bailey, Journalist and Political Novelist, Dies at 82
headline.print_headline: Charles W. Bailey, 82, Journalist and Political Novelist
